metadata.name: Real Imaginary | #1@0 Bubbly River
metadata.description:
In the continuum limit of Time and Space of the Real Imaginary Verse, Quantum entangled Singularities within single particle of Crystal energy.

Collect all the pieces of the Crystals to claim Legendary Singularities. Real Imaginary Crystal is an edition of artifacts living on the Ethereum blockchain from my personal exploration of the nature and behavior of matter and energy. 

Each item has been carefully curated and programmatically generated from a rich set of mathematical and visual attributes to highlight the beauty, diversity and magical correlation to our world. Produced by custom software written for the experiment. 

This collection is part of an ever growing collectable, tradeable and playable Real Imaginary fungible tokens family.

"A black hole really is an object with very rich structure, just like Earth has a rich structure of mountains, valleys, oceans, and so forth. Its warped space whirls around the central singularity like air in a tornado.” ― Kip Thorne

Discover more at https://linktr.ee/realimaginary
